title: Sketchbook Folio, "Night Landscape with Crescent Moon", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Roughly drawn, dark landscape with large trees at left and additional trees farther back at right. At left, behind trees, distant hill. Crescent moon in sky at right-center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Night Landscape with Crescent Moon", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-48.
